input_text:
Job Title: Business Analyst – Cloud Managed Services - Digital Velocity

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
The Cloud Managed Services Business Analyst will play a pivotal role in facilitating the presales process, post sales process, and performing financial analyses. With a solid background in IT, along with a deep understanding of sales and IT operations, this individual will collaborate closely with CDW sales teams, technical presales teams, and back office operations.

The ideal candidate should be comfortable engaging with management at all levels to gain a deep understanding of our strategy and services. They will offer clients technical solutions, engage in discussions about their technical requirements, and actively participate in implementing technical solutions while adhering to industry best standards and practices.

This role works in a quality, professional manner to complete project responsibilities on time and on budget, resulting in high client satisfaction.

Primary Duties & Responsibilities

Performs a variety of billable consulting activities in support of clients’ objectives, which may include, but are not limited to:Pre and Post Sales Process ManagementApplication Administration and ConfigurationProcess ImprovementMarketing technology consultingData EngineeringDatabase AdministratioDocumentationReport development & VisualizationBusiness analysis and requirements gatheringData Analytics

Escalates technical questions and issues to more senior personnel as needed; asks for needed guidance to perform job responsibilitiesAchieves high levels of Client Satisfaction on all consulting engagements by executing to achieve client project expectations set by technical leads and project managersDocuments completed technical work for clientsMaintains technical specifications throughout a projectReviews and understands all assigned Statement of Work (SOW) obligations prior to services deliveryComplies with all time compliance and time entry guidelinesMeets billable utilization targetsTraining/Certifications: Attends training sessions or shadowing activities, and obtains industry related certifications as determined by managementAdministrative Overhead – Responds to email, phone calls, completes timecards in a timely manner, expense reports and status reports as required 

Basic Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Information Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related fieldAt least six (6) months of related work experience dealing with Data solutions. 


Other Required Qualifications

2+ years of experience in service management, service delivery, or related fields.At least 1 year of experience with cloud managed services platforms, preferably ServiceNow.Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with a wide variety of client and CDW team members, including management and technical staffStrong analytical and problem-solving skills.Proficiency in presenting complex concepts to diverse audiences.Experience in business process optimization via technology and integration.Ability to travel up to 25% of the time.Demonstrated ability to implement and troubleshoot application systems and configurations in the designated practice using procedures, scripts, and templatesDemonstrated understanding of core business functions of a typical company, and ability to employ step by step logic to solve business problemsDemonstrated ability to acquire further technical and consulting skillsDemonstrated verbal and written communication skillsDemonstrated ability to multitask and prioritize workloadDemonstrated customer service skillsDemonstrated ability to investigate problems and utilize problem solving techniquesDemonstrated ability to establish positive working relationships and work as a team player in a consulting environmentDemonstrated ability to be resourceful in working with disparate client and internal departments to deliver meaningful solutions 


Preferred Qualifications

Degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or Information Technology.Technical consulting experience with a focus on client-facing solutions involving enterprise software.


Essential Functions

The position exists to provide technical consulting solutions to customers and as such requires the ability to travel to and from customer sites and interact with customers on an ongoing and regular basis.

The above primary duties, responsibilities, and position requirements are not all inclusive.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
